title: Plate Appearance
description: Information about an individual plate appearance

id.description: Random 64-bit unique identifier for this plate appearance

playerId.description: The id of the player who is the batter during the plate appearance

result.description: The outcome of the plate appearance for the batter (e.g. BB, E, 1B, etc.)

runners.description: Location of runners after the conclusion of the plate appearance

x.description: X coordinate of where the ball was fielded (or where the ball ended at the end of the plate appearance if not fielded). Expressed as 32767ths of the field image from the left

y.description: Y coordinate of where the ball was fielded (or where the ball ended at the end of the plate appearance if not fielded). Expressed as 32767ths of the field image from the top
